short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple & Quick Vertical Tab Extension. Search(filter) Tabs, Drag&Drop Rearrange Tabs, Tabs Counter, Keyboard Control, Vertical View

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple Vertical Tabs for power user.

Version 2.0.2:
- support Chrome version 67.
- updated to new API.
- bug fixes.

Version 2.0:
- added Search (filter) Tabs.
- added Keyboard Control.

Version 1.9:
- added Rearrange Tabs (drag&drop support).

Version 1.8:
- added options page. 
(popup width size / title line size / tab counter switch)

Version 1.7:
- added tab counter.

Version 1.6.5:
- bug fixes
(empty scroll space / close button alpha / loading title / closed active tab)

Version 1.6:
- improved popup speed.

Version 1.5:
- added close button.
- changed UI design.


Author: Norio Shimizu
